Title: Goal II: Living the Dream
Writer: Mike Jefferies (screenplay), Adrian Butchart (screenplay), Terry Loane (screenplay), Mike Jefferies (story), Adrian Butchart (story)
Actors: Kuno Becker, Stephen Dillane, Leonor Varela, Elizabeth Peña
Plot: When Newcastle United soccer star Santiago Muñez (Kuno Becker) is offered a spot with Real Madrid, he accepts, but the move - accompanied by big money and fame - tests his ties and loyalties to family, friends, and business acquaintances.
